email_sequence.subject: Pebl Furniture: Found Pebl Furniture's critical operational failures
email_sequence.body:
Hey John,

I analyzed Pebl Furniture's sales process and found you're losing ~3 hours daily per rep on manual order processing - that's $3,750,000 in lost productivity annually.

• No mobile site for High Point Market?
• Pebl Furniture: Manual catalog navigation killing productivity
• Your 50 reps have no portal

Butler Specialty had identical issues. Fixed in 14 days, ROI in 47 days.

Walk me through what happens when a rep takes an order at a trade show today?

15-minute call to show you their solution?

Best,
[Your Name]

Your competitors are 40% faster. Quote time: Them (minutes) vs You (hours).

email_sequence.subject: Pebl Furniture: $3,750,000 annual crisis intervention
email_sequence.body:
Hey John,

Pebl Furniture's current inefficiencies:

• Productivity loss: $1,500,000/year

[Your Name]

email_sequence.subject: 35 days to High Point Market - Pebl Furniture ready?
email_sequence.body:
Hey John,

Noticed that High Point Market still doesn’t have a mobile-friendly site? You’re potentially missing out on 52% of users who access business info on their phones. At Pebl Furniture, we specialize in optimizing digital platforms for mobile use, ensuring that your customers have the best possible experience, no matter the device.

How about we schedule a quick call to discuss how we can boost your mobile presence? Let me know a time that works for you this week.

Looking forward to helping you enhance your digital footprint!

Best,
[Your Name]

email_sequence.subject: Final warning: Pebl Furniture's $3,750,000 crisis
email_sequence.body:
Hey John,

I noticed that High Point Market doesn't have a mobile-optimized site. Did you know that 80% of industry professionals use their mobile devices to engage during trade events? A responsive site could significantly enhance user interaction and satisfaction.

Let’s discuss how Pebl Furniture can help create a seamless mobile experience for your attendees. Are you available for a quick call next week to explore some proven solutions?

Look forward to boosting your event’s accessibility and engagement.

Best,
[Your Name]

final_warning.case_study_warning: Butler Specialty waited 2 years, cost them $1.4M
